Package games.negative.alumina.leaderboard

Class Leaderboard<K,V extends Comparable<V>>

java.lang.Object
games.negative.alumina.leaderboard.Leaderboard<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - Key type which can be used for identification, such as UUID!
V - Value type which can be used for sorting, such as Integer!
public abstract class Leaderboard<K,V extends Comparable<V>> extends Object
Represents a sorted leaderboard which can be updated and queried.
